price: 53. Tango tokokufa mpe tokomi mabele na mikuwa, boye tokotunamaka?
arabic: أَءِذَا مِتۡنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابٗا وَعِظَٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَدِينُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: a-idhā mit'nā wakunnā turāban waʿiẓāman a-innā lamadīnūna
